page.title: 07Ashbury Church Fete 1985.
page.content: The fete on Saturday 13th July in the Manor garden, began at 2.30p.m. and it was well attended. There was a dog show and there were a lot of dogs that entered it.There were some small dogs and also some big dogs. At 3.oclock there was a gymnastic display and Ashbury School did it. Everybody did well and it was a good display. There were all kinds of stalls like the the bottle stall,clothes,white elephant ,book stall, icecream van,flower stall,raffle,the number of sweets,hoopla,treasure hunt, cake stall,pony rides and also the fishing game where you have to get the wooden fish out and you get some sweets.At night there was bingo which had some good prizes.The weather was nice in the afternoon but horrible at night.In the end they raised 1,084 pounds.
